content.question: Block <math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>X</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> of mass <math alttext="4 M" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>M</mi></mrow></math> travels at a speed <math alttext="5 v sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>5</mn><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> toward block <math alttext="Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Y</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> of mass <math alttext="M" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>M</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>, which is initially at rest. After block <math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>X</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> elastically collides with block <math alttext="Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Y</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>, block <math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>X</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> has a speed of <math alttext="3 v sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>3</mn><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> in the same direction as before the collision. What is the speed of block <math alttext="Y " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Y</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> immediately after the collision?

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
